charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_010: Where’s a good, open space around here...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_020:
Hm? Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you out shopping?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_040: Really? If that’s the case, could you help me out?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_050: I was just taking a stroll.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_060: Really? If that’s the case, could you help me out?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_070:
I was looking for a good place in town where
I could train.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_090:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All right, then. No time like the present! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_110:
Great idea, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
All right, then. No time like the present! Let’s go!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_120: I’m glad you knew this place! You’re a lifesaver!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_130: Onix is bigger than most Pokémon, after all.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_140:
It can be pretty difficult for us to train unless
we’re outside or in a Gym.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_160: Onix seems happy. He must like this place.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_170:
I’m glad we found this place,
then, Onix.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_180: Onix seems happy. He must like this place.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_190: Onix has been my partner for a long time.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_200:
So it’s my duty as his Trainer to give him a
space where he can move around freely.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_210: But now, it’s about time we got to training!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_230:
Yeah! I want to make sure that I’m completely in
sync with Onix during our battles!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_250:
It can be for Trainers, too! I want to ensure I’m
completely in sync with Onix during our battles!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_260: By training and working out with Onix...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_270:
I naturally get to see what he’s good at and bad
at, how he fights, and what his abilities are.
That tells me how to best use him in battle.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_280:
It’s because I do this that Onix and I have won
countless Pokémon battles.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0301_290: Do you think I can get stronger, too?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_300:
Of course!
As your personal coach, I guarantee it!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_310: Do you think I can be more like you?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_320:
Of course!
As your personal coach, I guarantee it!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_330:
Wait, are you Brock?
THE Brock?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_340:
That’s right!
I’m the rock-solid Pokémon Trainer Brock!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_350: And, uh... Can I help you?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_360:
We became Rock-type Pokémon Trainers after
being inspired by you!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_370: Brock! Please let us train with you!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_390:
Then, [Name:PlayerNickname ], why don’t we
try out what we were talking about earlier?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_400:
I’m sure it would be good training for these
fellas, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0301_450: Oof, I can’t feel my arms...
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_460: Yeah, those hikers look tired...but satisfied, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_480: Yeah, those hikers look tired...but satisfied, too!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_500: Of course! I meant to work out myself!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_520: No worries! I meant to work out myself!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_530:
You know, you have a really good sense for
Pokémon battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_540:
You’re definitely destined to become a great
Trainer in the future.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_550: I want to be there when it happens!
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0401_570:
Ha ha! Well, life’s most fun when you have lofty
goals, right?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0402_590:
Ha ha! Well, life’s most fun when you have lofty
goals, right?
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_600:
Take me, for instance. I have Trainers that know
me now, sure.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_610:
But at one point in time, I was a rookie just
like you.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_620:
From there, I focused on experiencing as many
things as possible. Like that training.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_630:
And after a long time of doing that, I became a
Gym Leader.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_640:
So I know that you can do the
same, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_650:
The workout we did today was strictly what I
developed with Onix.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_660:
If that workout and training session can inspire
you, that would make me happy.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_670: Onix is cheering you on, too.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_0302_700: Well, I’ll do what I can.
charaepi_ch0015_00_takeshi/2301_1201_720: If there’s anything I can do to help, let me know!
